description:
Fire man burnt from his loss to Rockman decides to take revenge in a string of random attacks to draw Rckman`s attention that end up ruining Meiru`s hair. Netto`s unkind actions upset Meiru causing her to delete Netto`s homework. Rockman`s unkind comments hurts Roll`s feelings.
Meanwhile the attacks continue finally giving Roll a challenge to give to Rockman. Roll decides to take the challenge herself. Gutsman tells Roll of the challenge. Roll starts to lose but is saved by Rockamn. Rockman soon starts to lose and is saved by Roll (using Gutsman as a human torpedo).
In the end both friendships, human and navis are saved.
